      • setBallMovement

        public void setBallMovement(double velocity,
                            double angle)
        Sets the balls movement parameters. Used to simulate hitting the ball.
        Parameters:
        velocity - between 0 and MAX_VELOCITY
        angle - -180 to 180 degrees. 0 degrees means straight up.

      • simulateRound
